Name: French Connection
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The apricot and almond notes in amaretto combine perfectly with brandy in this simple cocktail.
History: Named after the 1971 American crime thriller film, The French Connection , this brandy-based cocktail is a sibling of the better-known Scotch whisky-based Godfather . Both cocktails, along with the similar vodka-based Godmother , appear in Brian F. Rea's 1976 Brian's Booze Guide .
